name: Symbol Icons Browser
description:
Symbol Icons Browser makes it easy to browse and copy symbols from SF Symbols, Material Icons font and Font Awesome.

# Ready to use
To use this plugin, Please install San Francisco font Material Icons font (.ttf) and Font Awesome (.otf).

San Francisco font: https://developer.apple.com/fonts/
Material Icons font (.ttf): https://github.com/jossef/material-design-icons-iconfont
Font Awesome (.otf): https://github.com/FortAwesome/Font-Awesome

# Usage
1. Find the symbol you want to use
2. Click the symbol

# Click Options
- Copy: copy symbol glyph to clipboard
- Copy&Paste: copy and paste symbol glyph to selected text objects
- Create: create new symbol glyph as a text object on the canvas
